game_description: Neotrie VR enables users to create, manipulate, and interact with 3D geometrical objects and 3D models in general, of several types. It also allows teachers to create VR scenes with activities for their math classes.
review_1: This app is getting better and better! Congratulations!
review_3: The best software for interacting with 3d Geometry! One can make geometrical figures as if they were real, in a few minutes. It needs some practice to dominate some of the tools, like the graphing calculator or the fractal tool.
review_4: I’ve been using NeoTrie VR in my classes for 2 years. I have experience teaching student teachers, secondary and primary students. Neotrie is a great tool for designing and implementig inductive 3D geometry lessons. My students love the experience, they show interest and understand important ideas by visualizing and interacting with 3D representations.
review_5: Visualization in geometry is one of the most difficult skills to develop with right tools. Neotrie VR allows you to work on multiple aspects of geometry with all possibilities it offers. With an easy and pleasant inteface I recommend trying it¡
